name: All That Remains (itch) (ElysianGames)
description: All That Remains started as a project when all of us were at university together, and has since been a side passion project that we wanted to polish off. There may be 1000 things we want to change, and optimization to be done, and graphics to be improved, but we are extremely happy with how far we, and the game, have come, and where it is at now.
